column2: you guys. This is the place to take your coworkers because they will love you and promote you for it. This is the place to bring your significant other because they will love you for it and likely propose to you the next morning. This is the place to to bring your grandmamz because she will love you for it and pinch your cheeks and buy you more crunchy chicken sandwiches than you could ever need in your whole life. You get my point.
